website_summaries.verdict: One of the few cake pop makers capable of baking other small treats in the same space.
pros: Unique interchangeable baking plate design makes it easy to switch between making cake pops, donuts, and cupcakes
Cleanup is easier than other makers
cons: Baking surface often cooks cake pops unevenly, creating mixed results

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift!
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of the babycakes multi-treat baker you can switch out the plates easily and you can bake things quicker without having to use the oven. It also comes with a decent instruction guide and a few recipes. The only thing I do not like about it is I washed all the plates prior to using it and I've used mine about 3 times altogether so far, and it puts off a very foul smell. I believe it comes from the actual machine itself which you cannot submerge in water to clean. It doesn't seem to effect the taste of any of the treats but the smell from the machine lingers awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Moles

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 9 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, I helped her the 1st time and after that, she has been making them all by herself and so we have cakes everyday 😁 She has made the 3 shapes finding the donuts the hardest to do. She has made vanilla, chocolate and apple cider cupcakes, donuts and baby cakes. She got herself the decorating set to help her put the dough in the shapes. We are all very happy and we can’t wait for our morning treats😋
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I regret not buying this machine earlier. Fresh, homemade donuts in 10 minuts!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.plate alignment is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept, but the plates dont line up correctly. It doesnt affect the flavor or cooking, it's a cosmetic issue.. the only one that lines up correctly is the middle. That one is perfect. (Pointing at a middle one) The alignment is an issue with all 3 sets of plates. I would definitely be more upset if I was going to give the baked goods as gifts or sell the baked goods, but since I'm only using it at home, it's not that big of deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ؟؟؟؟؟
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what happened. Just to connect the electricity Heated the device and issued a smell of fire then separated the electricity and no longer works Unfortunately I am very frustrated
customer_reviews.author: laila

customer_reviews.title: Take your time baking !
customer_reviews.text: My favorite little cake maker as of yet! Finally used it for the first time last week making healthy little donuts and they came out super cute a great addition to potluck dinners for friends and family to enjoy! Unfortunately the shape only comes out well on one side- not both 😩 Here’s my best tip: 1. After you bake halfway- flip it and fill the mold again to stick both halves together! 2. Less is more if using rising cake flour! 3. One and half tablespoons of cake mixture is enough to create the half shape- then one heaping tablespoon for the other half.
customer_reviews.author: Super !!!

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and unfortunately right out of the box it was clear there was a problem as there was a missing screw due to a broken piece at the hinge. But it looked like it would still work okay without since the other three screws were fine, so we proceeded to make a batch of donuts—as my 10 year old had been eagerly waiting for this thing to arrive. We made one batch and then it started making very loud popping noises inside —sounded like something sparking and smelled very strongly of burning plastic. So we unplugged and won’t be using again. Sadly that made for a very expensive batch of donuts.
customer_reviews.author: SarahCR

customer_reviews.title: Another small kitchen appliance...YES!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that save you time because it makes cake balls, cup cakes and donuts a dozen at a time and the cleanup is easy. I’m not a baker and I was able to make these on my first try! If I can do it, anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: MissPrettyKitty

customer_reviews.title: Way too dangerous...stupid design...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a big disappointment for me. I purchased this Baker with all hopes and dereams all it did was burning... there is not any settings for how hot or how cool you want it to bake I knew that but it became a problem when I realized this item is overheating to the point you can't hold handles and plastic starts burning somewhere inside you can smell it. It does bake but so much hassle and danger I burnt 2 fingers at first try. No I won't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yakup Sert

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her birthday (at her request). Out of everything the kids and I gave her, this is by far her favorite gift. Both my wife and daughter use it weekly for Kodiak "donuts" and are quite happy with the end result. Given some previous reviews this may not last a year, but given the price for a non-essential appliance, we can afford to get another one when it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Barton

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for children's use
customer_reviews.text: This machine is dangerous. It gets too hot and as soon as I plugged it in took out a circuit breaker. The smell that comes out when working on it is like something is burning. The plastic gets SO hot that's it's dangerous for children. To the point that it cannot be touched. Then how can one open the lid ?! Hmmmm... do not recommend it. I was very excited but just decided to make cake pops the old way. Sometimes a shortcut it's not the best/safe option. Old school is fine 🙂 for now.
customer_reviews.author: La pianista

customer_reviews.title: but overall I'm not at all that happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 4 times for making cake pops. The temperature is too hot and ends up burning the outer layers to a crisp. I've tried a couple of recipes and have tried to remove the pops in no more than 2-4 minutes, so the outer layer is not burnt. I have yet to try it and experiment to get it right, but overall I'm not at all that happy with it. Also difficult to achieve the ball shape.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the terrible baker in your life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister. Let me tell you about dear old Lorelei. She can't bake or cook to save her life (other than grill cheese). She made lemon bread, that turned out to be a brick, she made pancakes, which were perfect gold on the outside, and complete liquid in the inside. I figured why not get this for her. She loves it, says it makes baking so easy and the things she makes are actually edible. Comes with recipes for the machine also.
customer_reviews.author: Picky chooser

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 3-1 machine and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: It came with 3 Interchangeable Non-Stick Baking Plates to make 7 Cupcakes, 7 Donuts, or 12 Cake Pops. Its great that the plates can be removed from the machine for washing. I've tried the cake pops, it came out pretty good shape but it take a longer time than other baking machine comparing to my waffle machine, that's why I minus 1 star. Very easy to operate without having to read the menu. Other than using it to make cake pops, I can also use it to make Japanese Takoyaki octopus ball or Egg puffs (a very famous Hong Kong local street-side snack). I'm glad I've purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Bo Au

customer_reviews.title: Won't give you evenly baked round pops!
customer_reviews.text: This cake pop maker cooks unevenly and doesn't shape the pops in a perfect circle. The bottom bakes much faster than the top. I ended up flipping the pop half way thru, then tried flipping the actual machine. It was hot, and still did not form perfect ball shaped cake. I have tried several recipes and tried filling the pans in different amounts of batter using a piping bag, still no luck.🤨
customer_reviews.author: Sound Bath Escape

customer_reviews.title: homemade gluten free donuts
customer_reviews.text: My sister has the Babycakes mini donut maker and is always bringing these delicious homemade gluten free donuts to family gatherings, so I decided to get one too. I like that the multi treat maker has the additional inserts and that they pop out for cleaning. My sister tested it out for me and says that hers has better nonstick, but hers is harder to clean because it doesn't come apart. She also says my multi treat maker can cook one more donut each time compared to hers. Looking forward to trying it out for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Burning Smell, but Still Great Tasting
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use; just plug it in and you don’t have to set any temperatures. I used a piping bag so I wouldn’t make a mess trying to add the batter quickly. The only negative is the burning smell while using it. I couldn’t get the smell out of my nose but my husband (who had just come home) said the burning smell didn’t transfer into how it tasted. My kids enjoyed doing this with me and it is so quick it managed to keep their attention the whole time!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Corona

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely fantastic you will love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it! I make cake pops with my five-year-old grandson we had a wonderful time, they bake quickly come out tasting wonderful. The fact that you can switch out the plates and make three different type treats with one machine is awesome. I have three different machines when you can have one that makes all three? I used to have a different cake pop machine only make cake pops, this is way way better, absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Haun

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children
customer_reviews.text: Read cautions and reviews on the web. We are still tweaking to try and get a good product. Not for children under 10 to use alone as it is very hot and a bit of a challenge to get product out. We ended up using plastic spoons. We also ended up turning machine off while filling and then decreasing baking time. Their website for recipes is no longer functional.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this treat maker for my 12 year old daughter. We have used it to make mini donuts several times. Works perfectly and is easy to use. Comes with a great recipe book too. We have found that there is no need to spray the donut molds with non stick spray. Donuts come out very easily on their own. Highly recommend the Apple cider donut recipe in the instruction booklet!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Z

customer_reviews.title: missing items
customer_reviews.text: this product came with missing items. i got nothing except the machine itself. It had no manual, no recipe book , no fork, no sticks, and other things that were supposed to come with it. Very upset, either someone took it ALL OUT, or it comes like this, which is highly disappointing, because you do not know now what to do with it or how to use it. Going on internet, i found that this product is supposed to come with other supporting items.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase! My 7 year old loves to bake with me. I wanted something besides an easy bake oven, that we could use our own mixes and recipes in. This little thing was the answer. It bakes up donuts and cupcakes and cake pops in minutes. We use it all the time. Easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: A little of that

customer_reviews.title: Its Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This little Baker is Wonderful to use! My Granddaughter loves Muffins so I used it to Make little Muffins!! Use any Cake batter and in 4 minutes you have little Muffins!! It's easy to clean,,,just take out the plate and wash it. it gets Very Hot so keep little fingers away!! I love the option of different cakes,,,cake pops,,,donuts and our favorite,,Muffins!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: It Broke...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for four times and then it just broke... I don't recommend this because it is difficult to clean and it doesn't last. I can't believe it only lasted four attempts! Let's see if the company responds to this post. I will post any updates.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Easy, safe, and yummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 10 year old granddaughter who has a great interest in baking. The first one arrived cracked and before I could return it a new one was at my doorstep. So far we have only made doughnuts with pancake mix and maple syrup glaze. The machine worked like a charm and very a little safety instructions she was able to make the second batch by herself. Her teenage sister stated that it make an amazing breakfast treat. We look forward to making cupcakes and cake pops with the same machine. Hopefully next time they will save me one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 15 year old Daughter
customer_reviews.text: She makes donuts and mini muffins with it, they are amazing. What else do I really need to say? Easy to change configurations, easy to clean, easy to bake. The only reason not to buy this is if you have no self control, you might end up being 400 pounds if that's the case.
customer_reviews.author: mjl

customer_reviews.title: I just love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product. Now, I can enjoy all my traditional Indian fried items without lot of oil...My only request to the company is that they would make waffle maker interchangeable tray and may be some other, I will buy them happily.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavna

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little unit... I waited till now to do the review since I wanted to give it time to see how it would hold up. All attachments are amazing and they take so little time to set up and also "bake" the cupcakes/cake pops/ and donuts. Love how quick it is and how I can make small batches so easily now. I have my own cake company and have even used this to make some products before a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Gets really hot!
customer_reviews.text: Buy and use hot mints! These people never heard of insulation. The lid is heavy and will fall easily if bumped. This machine should not be used by children. You will notice a color change on the top. This is normal.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Monson

customer_reviews.title: Item Smokes and leaves a lingering burning smell
customer_reviews.text: Have used item 5 times, hoping for an improvement, but continually smokes and smells up the whole room. Have stopped using it. Very unhappy with item. We were sooo excited to get it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: WOW soooo fun and easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, my husband bought it for me as a gift and I've already used the mini cupcakes and the mini donuts the plates snap in and out so quickly and easily and I love that they can go in the dishwasher! It's extremely easy to use and my family is thoroughly enjoying all of the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Angry Wife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife used it the for the first time and after the foul smell with was mentioned in the book, she loaded some cake batter and it stopped working. Couldn’t get any power followed the directions and it just stop working. Can’t return it, brought it months ago it was a valentines gift. LOUSY PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Not too great
customer_reviews.text: It gets too hot and your donuts are either burned or not baked all the way through. Taste is only as good as your recipe but this appliance is not exactly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This item is very dangerous because the top plate latches on with a tiny plastic latch. The top plate kept falling off almost burning us!
customer_reviews.author: Optombooks

customer_reviews.title: plates do not line up!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great idea, but the plates do not line up together. The result is two half spheres that are offset by about 1/8 of an inch. I would be embarrassed to have these for my granddaughter's b-day party, which is why I bought the machine. The taste is good though! I'm going to see if it can be taken apart and adjusted somehow - otherwise I will need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Jonasson

customer_reviews.title: Fastastically perfect for baking small treats with small kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what i needed to get my kid interested in baking and learning about portions with the ingredients. It’s a real patience builder and a stomach filler (my fav part!!). Great for the wallet too, as the 3-in-1 beats other options.
customer_reviews.author: Rix

customer_reviews.title: Good for life skills
customer_reviews.text: Have to a 10 year old as her big Christmas gift. Now she can make her own party snacks. She does. A box of cake mix goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st Use...but Donuts Turned Out Great!
customer_reviews.text: The latch that keeps the item closed snapped/broke off on the first use. No apparent reason...maybe item was defective and got too hot. Not sure. Sent back for refund and will reorder product to give it another chance. The donuts I made baked well and quickly. I need this product for my daughters play-dates and upcoming birthdays! Here's hoping the next one doesn't break. I'll update once I receive new product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all. Multi treat baker!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, I knew that I am not going to use it to just make baby cakes and it says multi treat baker so why not? I love it as I like to avoid deep frying so this serves the purpose. Love my little baker.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Many mini mighty MMM’s!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mini fun packed with a giant MMM!!! Somehow, the smaller, the tastier! Idk how but there was definitely a big difference in the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my daughter who is 13 could make treat gifts for her friends. it is easy for her to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin 18

customer_reviews.title: Happy Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to make mini treats (she’s 3 1/2), she was so excited to make doughnuts, cupcakes and cake bits, the unit worked well, and cleaned up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: RaeJ316

customer_reviews.title: Practice using it, the device works as described but requires practice to really master it
customer_reviews.text: It makes perfectly round cake pops, but I recommend making a few practice batch's to get the required cook time and amount of batter poured into the molds. Then you can experiment with your own recipes. My family loves the mini doughnuts, I'm going to try to make mini cheesecakes next
customer_reviews.author: avid collector

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This item is very dangerous because too hot and smelled very strongly of burning plastic in side.
customer_reviews.author: YAYEN SHIH

customer_reviews.title: a MINI treat maker!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that the doughnuts/ cupcakes don't brown as well on the top, but over all it's a good buy. I think I'll be using it for cake pops mostly though. I must have missed the part where it advertises that it's a mini treat maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Machado

customer_reviews.title: And it still comes out Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 3 times and my cake pops come out crooked!!!! I have tried different cake mix, tried smaller amounts of batter??? Some full, some 3/4 of the way, some low??? And it still comes out Horrible!!!!! It been in its box since I bought it cause I cant use it!! Its Horrible! I needed for my daughters Baby Shower?? Complete fail...
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's an all in one cake pop machine. Easy to clean and interchange the plates.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G😊MTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Made our anniversary fun
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a year ago in April and bought this to make fun treats and it was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rebemn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 3 in one. Be careful to line up plates perfectly or it will come out lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: kikid3

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cake pops. Otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: The plates do not align well for the ball pops. I tried and tried to align the plates and got burned but they never aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Everything burns
customer_reviews.text: Trying to return this. I have tried the cake balls, and donuts. Both items came out either burnt or uncooked. Not a fan, trying to return but don't have the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: SCORE on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I strongly dislike cooking in general but i do like doughnuts. Using this is easier than a waffle maker and better because i made doughnuts mmmm doughnuts. (Insert Homer Simpson voice). It was easy to figure out and easy to clean. It doesn't take up too much space. I would post a pic but i ate the doughnuts. Mmmm doughnuts.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Babycakes Rocks
customer_reviews.text: This Babycakes with interchangeable plates has been alot of fun for me and my grandchildren. We've made savory and sweet items in it. Appetizers are a breeze and everything is just fun when small. Cooks evenly and quickly. Your imagination can go wild with this cooker
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Heiden

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner bakers!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun! Easy to use and clean. Great for beginner bakers! Recipes included!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient when you want to have some baking done quick! Loved the size of it and easy it is to use it
customer_reviews.author: bvazquez2

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this was my daughter Christmas and after she got her recipe mixed she realized that she was missing the cupcake plates. She received 2 sets of doughnut plates. I’ve contacted Babycakes and I’m waiting for a reply. UPDATE: Company called back same day and said they’d ship out the missing plates. Super customer service!
customer_reviews.author: E Men

customer_reviews.title: Every day is cake pop day
customer_reviews.text: Great product but definitely a learning curve on how to pop the cake pops out.
customer_reviews.author: Andie.B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little cooker that works well. I unfortunately chose the wrong recipe and the mini donuts didn't taste good. But the machine worked real good and cleans up great. I haven't used the other plates yet but I'll be trying those next.
customer_reviews.author: TerryG

customer_reviews.title: Easy and compact.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Super easy to use. Very compact. Perfect for my small kitchen. There is an awful burning smell the first few times you use it but that goes away. I’ve been making vegan donuts and muffins. I made vegan meatballs in the cake pop thing. You really have to turn them half way through to get browning on all sides. I make scrambled eggs in the cupcake thing. No greasing. No oil. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jackiegirrl

customer_reviews.title: Good  but strange smile
customer_reviews.text: material is good . but strange smile come from it in the cake .
customer_reviews.author: angeles a.

customer_reviews.title: Very compact size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This 3 in1 baker is so easy to use and clean and it bakes so much faster than a conventional oven. Nonstick material, great addition if you like to bake cake pops, Minnie cupcakes and small donuts for your special events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooker! So happy with it. Use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It made it a lot easier for me to make cake pops for my nieces and nephews. Very easy to clean. Can’t wait to try and make donuts with it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Ram

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and one for my daughter in-law and they both love them they especially love the interchangeable plates so they can make cupcakes, cake pops, or doughnuts. The plates are very easy to change and everything is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like using this unit. I had some questions about the unit and the seller worked hard and fast to make sure we had a good experience. My family would recommend this product and purchasing from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of the M&Ms

customer_reviews.title: Donut Plates do not have centers for holes and no recipe boook
customer_reviews.text: My treat maker arrived without the instructions or the recipe book. I found a recipe book online here. However, the donut plates do not have dividers in the middle to actually make donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will turn in the product returnDinner bye
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bad product did not buy enoug extremely bad product not buy no I’m fine I will turn in the product return
customer_reviews.author: boss

customer_reviews.title: How to return the item and get my money back
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied with the product. I tried it last week for the first time and the cakepops don’t come out round at all. It seems like the plates or cakepop trays or the device is not allign properly. I want to know how would i be able to return this item since I didn’t get any labels and for sure it cannot be used
customer_reviews.author: Alcides H Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My kids think its the coolest thing ever! It does stink when you first plug it in. I plugged it in the garage to let it heat up for the first time and within about 5 minutes the smell went away.
customer_reviews.author: kmamab

customer_reviews.title: Love the doughnut shaped brownies!
customer_reviews.text: Technically a duplicate purchase since my daughter "lost" her first one. Found it the afternoon this arrived. This has more accessories than her first one and we can make doughnuts now!
customer_reviews.author: James "Booman"

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!!! Took a couple try’s but once I got the hang of it it was easy
customer_reviews.author: Mari mar

customer_reviews.title: Better than Easy Bake
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was heartbroken when she couldn’t figure out the easy bake oven. We bought her this as she is just learning to cook and bake. She absolutely loves it. We made donuts the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Fun with baby cakes
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Tried to make some Cake pops. Then tried some donuts. Was very easy to use and clean. It brings out creativity in your baking as you want to decorate everything that comes out of this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Cake pop galor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and convenient. I made cake pops like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Grassi

customer_reviews.title: Babycakes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Used a basic doughnut recipe... and they were AMAZING. Probably going to wear this thing out over the next year or so, that’s how much I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: defective?
customer_reviews.text: horrible smell. Thought it was an electrical issue of some sort like burning wires
customer_reviews.author: G. N

customer_reviews.title: A favorite must have for quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Been lots of fun to make quarantine doughnuts with kids. Only takes up a small space, but makes regular size doughnut holes and mini doughnuts. Wish it came with more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in small bites
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby so he could make doughnuts at home! He got a laugh and then he made blueberry donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Nancyf64

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it USED
customer_reviews.text: Bought this & it doesn’t even work, does NOT turn on. Returning this used non working item! If you were honest and stated it doesn’t work, I would have saved myself time & money & NOT bought this broken product! Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets HOT......NOT SUITABLE as an activity with children. Putsy getting an entire batch of batter made into pops.......batch bakes are small in number.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Don't push children in one direction  ventily guide them letting the decide for themselves.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Grandaughter is who interested in food Preparations .Babycakes was easy to use as well as a learning process... Great product in the long journey deciding if a career in one of the for prep fields would be good for her.
customer_reviews.author: HopSing, Artie

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected but did an amazing job with mini treats
customer_reviews.text: I really like this treat maker, a bit smaller than expected but it's great. I've used it twice with no problem and my little treats came out great, my children can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee Russell

customer_reviews.title: smell of burning plastic on first use
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with my experience using this device. The first time I used it to make cakes, there was a strong smell of burning plastic. I did not find any external parts that were burnt or melted. Very cheap plastic components.!! I would not recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dineshkumar Bhagat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: 3 in 1, you can’t find a better deal! Instruction manual was easy to follow. Fun for girls night.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: i love baking but sometimes you just don't have time . i love how i can make multiple treats at once in just 5 minutes. 7 cup cakes/doughnuts or 12 cake pops in just 5 minutes. ridiculously easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Oven skipper! This one is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, no sticky anything and 5 minute donuts!!
customer_reviews.author: OM AB

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use my children can make cupcakes and other items
customer_reviews.author: sarah kammer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. We use to make Indian Vada without the oil and the grease.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: Two hit wonder...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 batches and then during the third it stopped working. Kind of a bummer because I was really looking forward to having it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Went from love to Hate
customer_reviews.text: Loved how fast and easy it was to make different treats for the kids. Machine was working fine and one day while using it midway through it started to get cold. Unplugged it and let it completely cool off, plugged back in and unit will no longer get hot. That would have only been the fifth time using the machine.
customer_reviews.author: patricia williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have found this all-in-one treat maker. The kids and I love it, very easy to use, baking times are literally half the time. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Darrah

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time and product was well packed. The Babycakes Multi - Treat Baker is exactly has described and so far I have used it to make muffins and they came out perfect . I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deonizia

customer_reviews.title: Quick and convenient way to make small batches  ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old future baker. Works as described and super easy to use. Only caution is trays gets really hot making init really hot. I only let my daughter use with supervision...
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Rothfuss

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: This is my second baby cakes baker. I purchased this one for my Granddaughter for a wedding shower gift because I have so much fun with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this but after using it for 5 mins it started to give hard plastic smell. I want to swap this for another one but I don't see that option.
customer_reviews.author: SadoK

customer_reviews.title: Cooks very fast
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea for a product but cooks food very fast so you have to be careful it wont burn your food. Cake pops come out with more of a cupcake consistency not a true cake pop.
customer_reviews.author: IcedQuad

customer_reviews.title: The only issue I've ever had with this is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I've ever had with this is getting the mold plates to align properly. Everything always cooks perfectly, but sometimes they come out lopsided or uneven if I don't hold the top half to the side as they cook. But as long as you're willing to very carefully shift a hot metal plate (as I do using grill gloves), it works fantastically well!
customer_reviews.author: A. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good to make mini donuts cake pops and cupcakes
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: I love it with all my heart
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make mini donuts at least once a week, I bought it a year ago and them I had a problem with my amazon account and I'm doing the review now...
customer_reviews.author: Anali Mestre

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing works so well my wife even let's me use it.
customer_reviews.author: William

product_meta.title: Babycakes Multi-Treat Baker
product_meta.description: Baby Cakes - multi-treat baker convenient cord wrap non-skid rubber feet 3 interchangeable nonstick baking plates recipe booklet with hints and suggestions make 7 cupcakes 7 donuts or 12 cake pops latching handle power and ready lights.Bakes up to seven cupcakes, seven donuts, or 12 cake pops at once
feature_bullets: Make 7 cupcakes, 7 donuts or 12 cake pops
Latching handle, non-skid rubber feet and convenient cord wrap
Includes recipe booklet with hints & suggestions
